Reviews.Title: not receive the full kit
Reviews.Author: Marco Antonio Zeledon Truque
Reviews.Content: It really is a great camera, this camera deserves a ten, but did not meet the full kit, I received no small tripod and memory card reader, and the case is not the same as the one in the photo exhibition.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn McMullan
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my new camera!  Easy to use, fantastic zoom, great with action shots, love the features.  Camera bag is different from the picture, but I like it.  However, I am disappointed that I did not get the tripod as advertised in the package.  Still checking with supplier...no luck so far.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: floyd
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  Takes wonderful pictures.  Great for teenaged and first time adults  Don't like being forced to add words when I said all I wanted

Reviews.Title: WRONG PICTURE?
Reviews.Author: D HUBB
Reviews.Content: Did you know that you currently have a picture up of the Red P510 instead of the Red P520 which is what this specific listing is for?

Reviews.Title: great cam for outdoors,
Reviews.Author: Cjl
Reviews.Content: use as a naturalist or birder, three on our naturalist team use variuos versions of this model, love the built in gps for project noah sightings

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP Digital Camera with 42x Zoom (Red) Deluxe Bundle With 8GB SDHC card , Digpro case , cleaning kit and more
